titles.title: A bill to allow the obsolete submarine ex-Croaker (ex-SS-246) to be transferred to the Buffalo and Erie County Naval and Servicemen's Park in Buffalo, New York, before the expiration of the otherwise applicable 60-day congressional review period.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials.

committee.subcommittee: Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials
committee.name: House Armed Services

bill.summary: 9/28/1988--Introduced. Allows the obsolete submarine ex-Croaker to be transferred to the Buffalo and Erie County Naval and Servicemen's Park in Buffalo, New York, before the expiration of the otherwise applicable 60-day congressional review period.
